website_summaries.verdict: That Plantronics BackBeat Fit may not be perfect, but it's one of the best wireless sports headphones available.
pros: Plantronics BackBeat Fit is a lightweight wireless stereo headset (with integrated microphone) that features a sweatproof design and decent sound
It stays in your ears and most people should find it comfortable to wear
It also includes a reflective armband case for smartphones that doubles as a storage case for the headphones
cons: When you're running, the cord (around the back of your neck) does flop around a bit, which may bother some people

website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat Fit headphones are just about ideal for the gym, but not quite as suited for day-to-day use.
pros: Secure fit doesn't block out external sounds

customer_reviews.title: Like the speaker is blown
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product about 3 months now and already one of the headphones (left one) is considerably quieter than the other side, almost completely quiet even at full volume. Like the speaker is blown. It's only used a couple hours a day 4 or 5 days a week. It's never been dropped or come in contact with water (minus sweat). Disappointed because they were comfortable and sounded decent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were DOA, dead on arrival. Charged them up and was excited to try them out in the pool after a workout. Pulled it off of the charger after a couple hours, went to turn them on and nothing. Tried charging several more times and still will not work. Charging light stays at red even though it should go to blue after about 2 hours. In my infinite wisdom, I thought maybe I was just using them wrong, and totally forgot about it. Found it again a few months later and tried again and I wind up with the same results. Bought a Jaybird X3 recently, and have had no issues (other than it not being water proof).
customer_reviews.author: Crosby S.

customer_reviews.title: Limited life span
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other owners, one day my set simply refused to take a charge. The red light comes on to show that they're charging, but the light never turns blue. I haven't abused them. I've honestly not used them as much as I had planed to so I haven't worn them out; maybe a few times per month. I'm still using the same charging cable and charger, so nothing has changed. I've had these for right at a year. Maybe weak materials were used in manufacturing, or maybe it's "planned obsolescence" (the limited life span was by company plan). Whatever the case, I'm not buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Blargh

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Feb 22, 2016. Worked great up until last week and now they no longer turn on. Fully charged, but it won't turn on anymore. For over $80 I would expect them to last more than just 1 year. I wore them only when working out - about 4 to 5 times a week about an hour and a half each time. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue GTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wireless headphones I've used and I've wasted a lot of money searching. Good battery life, fit, light weight. My only slightly negative comment is that it's almost as if they funnel sweat into your ears and then you get this annoying ear issue where you can't hear well and it's muffled...not from the earphones going out because they never have, just because it's like you have water in your ear. I honestly don't know what could be done about that. In full disclosure, I do sweat a lot and it gets hot where I live so maybe not an issue for most.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Great But Short life
customer_reviews.text: I am really sorry and sad to give this amazing product just 2 star. The best workout or running companion you will ever get. this one holds the ear perfectly(Not In-ear) and the Bass is great for non In-ear head phones. You always have to use it on the highest volume though.. Reason for 2 stars... IT STOPPED working after 10 months of usage... :( One fine morning, it just dosent turn on.. You can search google for "plantronics backbeat fit not turning on"
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the headphones a ton, only every now and then. Now they won't hold a charge or even power on. I've tried charging it over night (+8 hrs). The red light just stays on. Other than the charging light, they are completely unresponsive. I used the headphones a total of 10 times, 100% disappointed. I'll never buy another Plantronics product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Alden

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Tried two of these over the past year. First one wouldn't synch at all to a device. The company is excellent as far as return and service response. However, got a second one. That synched to my device, but as soon as I placed my face/head in the water doing laps, the music became all garbled/underwater sounding. Was about to tighten my earpieces when the very clear "connection lost" message came across in perfect fidelity. So it is not going to work in the water as advertised. I have yet to find a bluetooth device that will tolerate ears under water type of swimming, so I guess I'm back to the waterproof device with wired headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, my headphones seem to be defective. This seems to be a fluke based on the other reviews I have read. Pros Very comfortable High quality feel Cons My device will not power on. They seem to be unable to fully charge. I have followed plantronics reset instructions to no avail. I will be contacting the seller shortly to inquire about a replacement. *I will update my review when they get back with me. Update: I was promptly sent a replacement set of headphones. These headphones are fantastic. They stay in well. They have really good sound quality. They even stay well connected via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after not using for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: When I initially received these for working out in the gym (I would get very sweaty) they worked fine. Audible pairing cues, somewhat comfortable. I used them for a couple of months then had a job change, which caused my workouts to go by the wayside. Fast forward two years later I pull them out again after we moved and try to charge them - nothing. Red light stayed on and never powered on again. I doubt I will choose Plantronics again.
customer_reviews.author: David Muench

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable for 1000s of hours
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with these. I've owned for 3.5 years, have run for 1000s of hours with them, even use them for calls during the day. Battery still charges albeit it no longer takes a full charge, but they still sound great after who knows how much sweat has poured over them. In a world of throwaway products that don't last, these have surprised me. I see other reviews with lesser results, so perhaps I got lucky, but I'll try a new pair when these finally fail.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Biron III

customer_reviews.title: These headphones have been awesome! There has been no issue connecting to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT RECEIVE A DISCOUNT ON THIS ITEM TO REVIEW IT! I have purchased about 5 different blue tooth headphones for jogging. The biggest issue is noise from the cord rubbing on my neck. Other problems include difficulties connecting to the phone. These headphones have been awesome! There has been no issue connecting to my Nexus 6p. The sound quality is good. It fits well and is comfortable when running. There is no sound while running of the cord rubbing against my neck. There are controls for pausing, advancing, volume, power, etc. The only drawback is that there are many buttons and they aren't intuitive. Overall, I really like it and I have used it 50 times or so.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well with a 5s, then NOT connecting to ANY device, Android nor iOS based HELP? ANYONE? AMAZON? PLATRONICS?
customer_reviews.text: Ok so ive had mines for sometime now, was pairing and working Flawlessly with my iPhone 5s, I recently upgraded to a 6s s and the phone isnt even seeing the device. As a matter of Fact, no bluetooth Enabled device is detecting the headset......None, no Android or iOS based device. I am lost as to what to do to get some redress for this product, and even though i type this review here, I most likely wont get any help from Platronics or Amazon so i have to accept that i WASTED my money on this device. Edit, I should Add the physically its very comfortable and fits well without wobbling, it is a great design.
customer_reviews.author: JCazoe

customer_reviews.title: the tips are styled a little like the apple iphone headphones so it's not like a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three different sets of bluetooth headphones. returned the jaybird. my ears are small and these fit in them perfectly. the tips are styled a little like the apple iphone headphones so it's not like a little round nub or ball...i feel like these fit the contour of the ear canal outlet better. also even though they hang over the ear they don't pull down on the ear or cause any discomfort. i actually don't feel like i'm wearing anything. i've worn them running many times and they are great. sound quality is good. easy to skip tracks. charge pretty quickly, battery lasts a few work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Dies after warranty expires (1 year)
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging RIGHT after the 1 year warranty expired. Plug in to charger and the light stays red; it never charges. They worked well until warranty expired... Definitely not worth the price tag for an item that only lasts one year. UPDATE: Plantronics responded to my inquiry that I sent them and basically said they wouldn't do anything to make it right. Be aware that these headphones die after one year and PLANTRONICS WILL DO NOTHING ABOUT IT.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: So far, the best I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Bluetooth headset by Plantronics for my son and he loves them. Comments: they stay put, hardly know I am wearing them, sound is very acceptable with the Yurbud enhancers skins, are just what I wanted to hear. Naturally, I had to test them first. Just ordered a pair for myself. Easily connected to any Bluetooth device. Controls are well designed. No doubt, my set will last until the tech is obsolete. My son, however, is tough on things (i.e, uses things normally,) and while they look exceptionally well made and capable of real world running and work-out bouncing and sweating, his experiences will be more realistic for what the advertisement copy promises. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: HaroldusMagnus

customer_reviews.title: Now works well!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously reviewed this as having very poor bluetooth connectivity. Well, the iOS 9 update for the iphone 6 fixed this. It works perfectly now, never disconnects. Original review: Here's the problem with this headset and the iphone. If your phone's bluetooth is connected to any other device (heart rate monitor, fit bit, apple watch), the head set will repeatedly disconnect to the point of being unusable. You have to make a choice-the music or the other device. If you intend on having another bluetooth device connected to your iphone, you will be unable to use these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Erpilot

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT headphones....until they just stop working one day randomly. I used them maybe 2-3 times a week during my workouts 30-45 mins. That's it. They worked beautifully for 2 years and then one day I picked them up and the sound was out in the right ear. Tried to get a warranty replacement, and the warranty is expired. I never dropped, misused or was rough with these headphones, they literally sit in a basket when I'm not working out on my stationary bike. Almost 100 bucks for lite usage. What crap.
customer_reviews.author: Metztli

customer_reviews.title: Short for up to 2 hours of usage before they get uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are solid bluetooth headphones with decent sound quality and appear to be sweat / water proof. I've found that they're good for wearing for shot periods of time, but the rubber tips tend to start to hurt after a while. As someone who likes to spend 2 or more hours on a motorcycle, I found that I can't comfortably wear these for a long trip. I experimented with rotating the earpiece and got a bit of relief, but still not good enough for a long ride. The wind and motor noise also makes it difficult to hear music playing through these (though I would imagine that for just about any other purpose, the volume is more than sufficient).
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth ear buds yet!
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best blue tooth headphones yet! I've owned several ear buds/head sets and for a bluetooth, this beats them all. I'm on the phone several hours a day and listen to music on the train. The battery lasts nearly all day unless I'm on the phone for 5 hours in a day) and does give my ears the plugged up feeling. Note though, if you are in a noisy environment, because these ear buds don't block your ear completely, you may have trouble hearing. Not completely blocking my ear though is also one of the reasons I like them. If I'm walking down the street, I can hear cars or other nearby noises.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: ... the headset fits my head and it is very good at surviving sweat etc
customer_reviews.text: Overall the headset fits my head and it is very good at surviving sweat etc. It fits comfortably around my ears and stays in place with movement. The only thing I don't like is that the volume of the sound from the ear pieces is not as loud nor as crisp sounding as my Mpow Bluetooth Headphones V4.1. Set at the same volume level on my iPhone 6+ the sound is perceived to be lower on the Plantronics. I think part of that is the ear pieces don't extend far enough to reach my ear canal like the in ear Mpow do. It would be nice to have some different ear pieces to adjust for these differences.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Really great set of headphones found after 8 attempts at sports headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one used recently and have been very pleased with this product. Battery life is long Fit is very stable and secure (except for YurBuds almost no headphones seem to work for me due to small ears). I hardly notice them during long runs Sync with Samsung S5 was quick and has a strong connection up to a good 30 feet (maybe more, but I was mowing the lawn with the phone on the porch) Controls are responsive and intuitive Sound quality was surprisingly clear and strong. This is particular nice to encounter as wired headphones with the Samsung phones tend to be poor due to low power sent through the headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Battery charge issue....no power....cant hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pair, blue and green/yellow. I went to charge both and use for walking.My blue pair wouldn't take or hold a charge. I could not power up. They are both bought in 2016, past warranty.Think I'll take it apart, since YouTube vid. Off to get a Bose pair?
customer_reviews.author: Tosa-Todd

customer_reviews.title: They have great battery life and I LOVE not being tethered to ...
customer_reviews.text: I always am using these. I've had them for a while now. I jump rope with them, run with them, even swim with them (though I can't put my head underwater or else it will lose the connection with my phone... I guess the bluetooth waves don't transmit well from air to water). They have great battery life and I LOVE not being tethered to a cord everywhere I go. I only wish that they had an easier way for me to switch between using them on my computer and my phone (multi-device bluetooth headphones are the next step).
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for What I'm Looking for
customer_reviews.text: Most earbuds or in-ear headphones do not consistently fit in my ears. However, these headphones are perfect for me, since they're comfortably held in with both an in-ear piece and by wrapping behind the ear. They're lightweight and bright, and they have pretty solid battery life, connectivity, sound, and functionality. It's worth noting that these are not noise-cancelling and have less bass than most other headphones, although I like that, since it allows me to be more aware of my surroundings when listening to music while walking/running/doing yard work/working out/etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Deputron

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 3rd gen plantronics customer and have seen their excellent products only improve over time, and have always been better than the competition by a wide margin. This product was one of, if the not the first bluetooth headset with ergonomically friendly earbuds and sound controls. After about 16 months of use at the gym, intense climbing and running, this product has earned 5 stars. The product has great battery life, connectivity, water resistance from heavy sweat or light swimming or running in the rain, and are lightweight and very functional. Highly recommended from a very critical yet relevant consumer for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Personal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I had been extremely wary of buying bluetooth headphones for running due to battery and pairing issues. However, these headphones pair easily each and every time you use them and the battery lasts forever! I recently ran Ragnar and they lasted me through 21 miles of running without needing a recharge. They are so comfortable that I forget that I am wearing them and they easily fit underneath hats. The buttons are very easy to use while running. They are also designed so that you can still hear traffic around you, making them the safest headphones I have ever ran in. I cannot recommend these headphones enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Saved for. Bought. Died. Buried. Mourned.
customer_reviews.text: I saved up and bought these as my go-to running headphones. They have good sound and fit comfortably. The problem is that now, 18 months later, they stopped working. They will charge, but they will no longer turn on. I expected them to last longer. I would rate everything else about them a five star product. But durability is lacking. It took me longer to save for them than it did for them to die! I hate to, but I am going to have to get another brand. It is a shame really. I really liked these.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best sports headphones EVER
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best sports headphones EVER. I've tried so many, now I have found these and I wear them almost 24/7, even in the shower. Just LOVE them. If you play hard but you want your music all the time, these are the way to go. Don't be misled by the "name brand" stuff that sells for double or triple the price (even if really tall athletes wear them in ads) ... these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Sweat Taps Right into Ear. Marginal Bass
customer_reviews.text: I'll be buying a completely different ear-bud oriented athletics headset next time. These speaker arms frequently just act as clinging highways for sweat to get routed straight into your ear. Frequently have to remove headset to towel out my ears. Ridiculous. Decent high and mid-range, but the low end is frustrated by it, once again, being an open-ear design. You have to hold the speaker arms into your ear to truly get any appreciable bass. NEXT!!
customer_reviews.author: SD Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's understandable that these wouldn't be for everyone; non-adjustable size, maybe not loud enough, etc. However, these are by far the best I've purchased. Fit tight and secure even with my glasses on. The sound is loud enough to hear over my air spin bike. These cannot be listened to at the loudest volume and still be able to talk to a person next to you; why would you want them louder? The best part is that they DO CONTINUE TO WORK after they become soaked with perspiration. First headphone I've had that continues to work. Easy to pair, easy to operate, battery will last for at least five hours with continuous play.
customer_reviews.author: timindbq

customer_reviews.title: Died after two times use!! DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I charged these all night and the light is still red.. kept charging them for a week and still red. Never turned lue as stated in the manuel. I only used these twice, went to give them to my friend and was embarrassed when they didn't work. I paid almost 80 bucks for these... big disappointment! Out of warranty, out of money.. out of luck.. DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones but moving on...
customer_reviews.text: I've had Plantronics Bluetooth headphones for 18 months and generally been happy. The first pair arrived defective, but Amazon replaced them quickly without question. I use them mostly for the gym, running, and riding my bike. They fit well, sound OK, and hold a decent charge. Occasionally, I had issues with them connecting to my iPhone or losing the connection. Yesterday, they died..stoppped pairing and now they won;t run on. I decided on the PowerBeat 3 Wireless despite the 2x cost b/c of 1)Longer battery 2)Better sound 3)Tighter Apple integration For the money, these are good headphones, but the occasional bluetooth problems can be frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B ryan

customer_reviews.title: I've used a lot of "cordless headsets"
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good headset. You can't compare sound of Bluetooth with corded ear buds but the sound on these is pretty good. Volume is pretty good as well. I like the controls there is a separate tiny button for on and off so you don't accidentally turn them off trying to control your music. They stay in place well since the connecting band is light and they employ ear hooks. The only negative for me is that they make my ears sore in the contact area after about an hour or so. I would buy them again though for this type of headset.
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Finkenstadt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I lost my LG HBS-730 Bluetooth headphones and decided to replace them with these. Initially, I was concerned about the fit; they seemed a bit too big for my ears. It took a couple of uses, but I got used to them and now find them quite comfortable. The sound quality is excellent. I use them for both high intensity cardio workouts and strength training. They are suitable for both, and I have yet to have one of the buds pop out. The case they come with is too small for my iPhone 6+, but it's great for keeping my headphones safe and easy to find in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse Kritschgau

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband. He wears them all day at work and loves them. The charge lasts him all day as long as he uses them for phone calls. When he uses them to play music constantly they only last a couple of hours. They do make his ears hurt by the end of the day but after a few days he got used to them. He says the sound is great. He is 70% deaf in one ear however he hears well this these. He also says they are easy to answer and end phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: N. Champagne

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: 1. These are uncomfortable in my ear after extended use. 2. They are much too quiet. I like it loud when im lifting and these cant get to where i need them when im trying to get pumped up for a heavy set. If i press thrm into my ear it gets better but once i move my hand away they pop eight back out. I considered keeping these strictly for doing cardio but that seems a bit silly. I'd say I have a relatively averge shaped head. A little on the narrow side. 6'3", 205 lbs. They dont fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: J Glass

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months and they work great. Several people have approached me in the gym to inquire about them. It's nice to be "unwired" while working out. I have no issues with the sweat. I use these 4+ times a week. There is a voice when you turn on the headphones that tells you "power on", "headphones connected" and "battery level high" (or whatever) which I feel is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: I've tried several bluetooth headphones and these are the best by far
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several bluetooth headphones and these are the best by far. Granted I've only owned them a week but unless it suddenly won't power on I can't imagine falling out of love with these. They fit so comfortably and the flexible solid wire that connects them feels comfortable behind my neck and never sticks to my neck during my trail running or mountain biking. Pairs easy and the controls are easy to operate once you familiarize yourself with the buttons. Great purchase and a great price. Delivered fast. Can't praise these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Stroz

customer_reviews.title: these stay in great, they sound good
customer_reviews.text: Have used different styles and always had trouble with earbuds falling out when working up a little bit of sweat, these stay in great, they sound good, and the controls make sense to me, I haven't had any trouble adjusting volume or skipping songs. My 18 year old has a pair as well and practically lives in earbuds and works out regularly and is very happy with them and the range they have. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MidWestMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: Of all ear buds I have tried over the years these fit the best and the sound quality including minimizing outside noise because of the fit is excellent. The blue tooth connection is great - sometimes a bit of a fiddle going from one broadcasting device to another. I use these all the time in the gym, shower and even sauna/steam room - LOL
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Overall this headset works great. I run 5-6 times a week about 40 ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this headset works great. I run 5-6 times a week about 40 to 50 miles a week. There are a few quirks if I place my phone somewhere other than my arm, the sound will break up in some spotty areas. Especially if it's a cloudy day. I also wear a headband for my ears and sometimes the pressure of the ear piece is painful. Typically the size of the ear piece does not bother me, but would be nice if it were a little smaller. Overall good value, good sound, best pair I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA J.

customer_reviews.title: They have good sound, I only use them for weight lifting ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to get these due to some reviews about fitment. They have good sound, I only use them for weight lifting and it's great not having a cord getting caught up and the ear phone coming out. Fitment is as described it sits just outside the ear canal so some ambient noise can be heard but it's not enough to deter me from using/recommending this product. Good highs and decent low frequency response, I have a set of the big brother to these Backbeat Fit pro and they are just as good with better low end, no doubt due to the over the ear style.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is about six to eight hours. Sound is good and they don't block out surrounding sounds so you can talk to someone while you are listening to something else if the volume is not turned up too loud. Very easy to pair just hold the power button until the voice says "Pairing". I have used it with an older phone that has BT 2.0 and it works fine for calls and to listen to music or a book. It pairs to a Fire HD 3rd gen and I stream movies with no time delay in the sound. On an earlier Lenovo Tablet (2 year old) there is some delay in sound for the video. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Audiomook

customer_reviews.title: Great high impact blue tooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for high impact workout. Like many have mentioned, these aren't noise canceling so some of the bass is lost, but safety first and all that. They are loud enough for me to hear music well both in outside traffic and inside a busy (and loud) gym. They don't fall out if your head moves sharply or if you're working on the heavy bag. Overall they are great! Only con was it took almost 10 pairing attempts to get it paired to my iphone. I paired it to my android phone and it paired immediately, so heads up on that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and pretty reliable
customer_reviews.text: Before committing to making the switch to Bluetooth headphones I purchased this one and the Photive PH-BTE70 to see which I liked better. I chose this one because it just seems more durable and has yet to prove otherwise, and there seemed to be a better range during phone conversations. The product definitely works as expected, but sometimes there are connection issues walking down semi-busy city streets with my connected phone in my left pocket. And if you are on a phone call, any background noise is heard and is a distraction to whomever is on the other line. Overall though, I have experienced only a few random cut outs and it is really easy to re-connect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Uwah

customer_reviews.title: Adjust the "fins"!
customer_reviews.text: I was about to return these headphones after my first run because my ears were in so much pain from the "fins". I decided to give them another go and fiddled with the ear pieces and realized I needed to adjust the fins (they swivel). That made all the difference!!! Now I love these headphones and would highly suggest them. The only thing is that you have to make sure the fins are in proper place otherwise your ears will sting after a short period. So long as you adjust before use, you will be very happy. I also love that at each power on they tell you the battery level. Seems to last quite a while too!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: MUST be avoided no matter what!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a 100% defective product Just do your research. Every last unit will die early with a red charging light that never turns green and never turns on. I bought three and all dead now. Super worthy of a class action since Plantronics has done squat to make it right. It’s an astonishing situation that’s w the dirty truth remaining largely buried for years now.
customer_reviews.author: TBinNYC

customer_reviews.title: HAVE OWNED MINE SINCE 2015 & STILL GOING STRONG
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me 3 years ago and they are still in perfect condition. I don't use them 5x a week like some might do but I would say I use them at least once a week and they are doing just fine. The sound quality isn't too bad (You aren't going to get over the ear type of song quality, duh) but it is exactly the type of headphones my ear shape needs.
customer_reviews.author: adam stratton

customer_reviews.title: Works fine until they don't - bait and switch customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for just over a year, then they died. Plantronics issued me an RMA when I requested a replacement - sounds great, right? - but only AFTER I paid and shipped them back did they tell me they'd be giving me a *discount* code for a refurb rather than a direct replacement because they were a few months out of warranty. The discount wasn't even that good, for an out-of-date headphone model. Bait and switch and wasted my money for no reason, and they refused to refund my return shipping costs. - Last time I buy Plantronics due to poor reliability and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Yoni

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great! They are just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They are just what I was looking for. They are pretty comfortable, though can be a bit uncomfortable if the first time you try them on. I like that I can still hear the world around me so if you are trying to tune out the world or get into noisy situations often you might want a different pair. But I find the volume level is perfectly fine for me. They connected really easily with my iphone, but I haven't been able to get them to connect to my laptop (2011 Macbook pro on bootcamp running windows 7). Overall the sound quality is great. I've only had them for few weeks, but so far not problems.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jaimes

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Stays on, clear sound and doesn't get in the way. If you're wearing a hoody, the strap can get caught which is slightly annoying, but nothing drastic. Also, I wish they had a little bit more distance, but they work in a normal sized gym just fine. Without wireless head phones I had to strap my phone to my arm, which would cause a sweat rash after a couple times. So, wireless is the way to go, and these are definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these. They are perfect for him and provide great quality. He says not only are they comfortable and form fitting, they are also noise canceling. He was looking for Bluetooth head phones he could connect to his Apple Watch. That way he doesn't need to bring his phone on a run with him at all. These were just what he was looking for, and they are priced pretty well for what you get. We would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: MBHE

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones because of the sound quality and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these November of 2015 and have used them a lot since then. I love these headphones because of the sound quality and the way they fit. The price was also very attracting to me when compare to the power beats2. I just recently received a set of power beats 2 wireless and have now had a chance to compare the two sets. I would honestly repurchase these plantronics headset because the sound quality is right there with the beats and the price is half that of beats.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: It is good. Battery life is adequate in its class
customer_reviews.text: It is good. Battery life is adequate in its class, sound quality is ok. Connectivity range is adequate (at least 30ft). Only problem it has is that it doesn't create a sealed sound experience like the other earbuds (like jaybird) so you hear ambient sound more. It is a good thing when cycling but not when you're in a gym which plays its own music. It stays better than jaybirds though. For people that sweat profusely during the activity, I'd suggest this one as jaybirds get loose when you sweat. Otherwise go with the jaybird. Battery life is slightly better than jaybirds.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing -- I've had these over the years and LOVE the fit
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered TWO of these and BOTH were DOA. The woman at Plantronics said they sometimes sit in the warehouse for years so it wasn't surprising. So disappointing -- I've had these over the years and LOVE the fit. The other complaint --with the ones I've had that worked--is that it is inconsistent with whether a phone call will play through the headsets or whether you (1) answer the phone w/the headset turned on; (2) the conversation doesn't play through the headset; (3) you have to turn the headset off and then turn the headset back on in order to hear the person. The small buttons aren't that sensitive so that takes some time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of workout headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered this headset, but this headset is amazing. I can lay down and do benchpress with either a barbell or dumbells, and I don't have to worry about the phone in my pocket or the cord getting in the way. It also works great when doing squats. This thing doesn't bother me at all. It doesn't block sound completely, but that will help on bike rides and such. It also has pretty good sound for how invasive they aren't. I also use them for work as a bluetooth headset, and people have no problem hearing me through the mic. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphones EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different sets of headphones with and without wires. These are perfect for running and also for all around use. While the sound quality it not as perfect as in ear models, they are even better for running because they don't ease out and allow for noise from cars and surroundings. I like them much better than my Bluebuds. The overall fit is so good that I often forget they are one. An added bonus is that they are so comfortable, I often forget they are on. The controls are easy to use and the battery life seems good enough for my usage. These were a home run for me.
customer_reviews.author: rtudisco

customer_reviews.title: not really red
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: got the blue ones instead and they are incredible. Absolute game changer for workouts. Hands free on the rowing machine and ARC trainer is worth every penny for these headphones. Pairs right away with your phone and easy to use. LOVE. I ordered these in red - please note that they are really more orange than red. I'm sending them back and getting another pair in blue. A lot of people at my gym have these so I have high hopes, but the red color is pretty awful.
customer_reviews.author: bluegreenbella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wireless headphones for running, working out, and everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Use these every day. Well, almost every day. They are comfortable for running, working out, and daily wear. These are not noise-canceling headphones. They allow you to hear what's going on around you while enjoying your music, or audio book, or pod cast. This was my first pair of bluetooth headphones, and I loved them. Until (after 18 months of constant use) they cracked on side on one of the ear pieces and wouldn't reliably turn on any more. Possibly just got beat up in my backpack. So, I am ordering another pair of these. I liked them that much.
customer_reviews.author: T. Richards

customer_reviews.title: These work great and have an awesome battery life
customer_reviews.text: These work great and have an awesome battery life. I made it through an entire marathon on one charge. Only drawback is that they dont come with different sized ear buds to fit different sized ear canals. They fit me OK but are a tad big so my ears sometimes get sore/irritated. The over-the-ear design is a tad annoying too and contributes to discomfort as well. Controls are easy and they sync up fast. Relatively lightweight. Way better than wired earphones. Overall 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CRB

customer_reviews.title: Good ... but...
customer_reviews.text: Portable, comfortable, but not quite it for me. Great for running, but after a few miles they slipped off. When laying down for a bench press, they slipped off. I didn't think that they were as loud as wired headphones. Don't get me wrong battery life was great, the case enclosed for the item and your phone provided it is a smaller phone not a plus sized IPhone Plus or Galaxy Plus or Note. Craftsmanship is also great, sweat and water resistant I would recommend the product, but it just was not for me. Time to return to the drawing board for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: great wireless headset, perfect for working out
customer_reviews.text: Love those headsets. While I like the original Apple headset with good sound and mic, the cable was just driving me crazy when working out. Then I tried a few wireless cheap ones even with good reviews and none of them were good: flimsy, bad sound, falling out, etc. Finally went back to trusted brand Plantronics and I was not disappointed. Construction is top notch, they stay in place, and sound is great. Not quite perfect: battery a bit short and the mic pics up a lot of ambient sound since it's out on the ear, don't take a work call in a starbucks with those! But very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: A. Girbal

customer_reviews.title: Quality with an expiration date
customer_reviews.text: At first, these appeared to be a great set of headphones for running. Excellent sound quality, stays in place without whipping your neck, nice color, simplistic controls and charges fast. My opinion changed drastically a month ago when I went to go for a run and found they were constantly disconnecting from my phone. Pressing the pause/play button would stimulate the Bluetooth connection so that they would reconnect. The interruptions were intermittent; in some cases they would disconnect 5 times in a row, other cases they would last for 15 minutes before dropping. While the quality appears good initially, I wanted something I could get more than a year and a half of use from.
customer_reviews.author: Darren S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones that do not come off your ears and at the same time let you hear sounds in the surrounding that are necessary for your safety. Great product. I do use it with my iphone. The microphone is not the best (hence 4 instead of 5 stars). People do hear background noises. However, I can hear the other party loud and clear! As a music headphone to hear songs from iheart radio etc, the music quality through the headphone is AWESOME! I do highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jamesbond008

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wireless headphones of all time. I had beats but nothing can compare to these and there affordable. I had a red pair but they finally broke after being crushed because improperly packed, by me. But I had them for five years, I washed them in the washing machine by accident and rolled over them with my car. And nothing happens to them, they were still working perfectly. I Hate having the wire connect my headphones because it can hang to low. These come right below the hairline. The battery last me for a about a week and I use them for at least 2-3 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jamjam

customer_reviews.title: ... the work that I do pressure washing it works great drowns out of the sound from the water
customer_reviews.text: I got to say for the work that I do pressure washing it works great drowns out of the sound from the water. Sound is great and I can't say it's 100% water proof but it's been soaked in water and still works so yea. The Bluetooth range is amazing I have been around 200' from my phone and it still works great. Battery last me about 10-13 hours with charging and while playing music the hole time. But there is a little piece off of the earbud that does start hurting your ear after while. That's me about 150' away working up in a lift while my phone is in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Headphones for Running/Working Out! Get these and save money in the long run!
customer_reviews.text: I FINALLY found the perfect Bluetooth headphones to wear running! I absolutely LOVE these! The two biggest issues I have with Bluetooth headphones when I'm running are they're either uncomfortable or the ear buds keep coming loose and fall out of my ears (especially when I sweat). These BackBeat Fit set have neither of those issues. Once you put them on, they don't move at all...they stay in place and they are so comfortable. Seriously, if you're looking for a great pair of Bluetooth headphones, get these! They are worth every penny! Otherwise, you'll spend lesser money on headphones that will just end up being replaced anyways.
customer_reviews.author: TomC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Bluetooth headphones! Bought one as a present and then one for myself. The controls are very user friendly making these easy to use. Turn them on and just go. There is a voice prompt that tells you the power is on and the amount of battery life. They stay in your ear and don't move at all when running, jumping etc. I didn't notice the bouncing of the cord as described in other reviews. In fact, I forgot I even had these on. Going to get a ton of use out of these things.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Volume WAY TOO LOW
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fit and finish. Sound quality is good. Big problem is the VOLUME, or lack there-of. I initially thought it was an iPhone6 problem, but when synched to either the iPhone, MacBook, and appleTV, the volume is just NOT loud enough. Maybe its an apple BlueTooth issue, but i would say if you are using an iPhone and you like to listen to your music a bit louder, you will not be happy. Just ordered the Beats2 and will update my review if these provide a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Good Sound & Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as plantronics is a popular brand, especially in the bluetooth earpiece market. I figured they'd be reliable since they make great earpieces. The headphones work wonderful, the sound quality is good and the battery lasts a decent time. Very satisfied that I chose these over other brands that die in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth overhear set I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable bluetooth over ear headphones I've used for running yet! I've used a bunch of different sets over the years and these are the best. I don't feel them, the connection is great, and its easy to use the button functions while running. There are some reviews that state the strap bounces on the back of peoples necks, and I have not experienced that at all. They perfectly fit over and in my ear, and I forget they are even there which is really important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Arrived

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable earphones for safe workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases over the past year. I use them while running, biking, traveling, sleeping, etc. I'm petite with small ears and earbuds generally hurt my ears. These are very comfortable and lightweight. They charge quickly and let you know when it's time to recharge. These are NOT intended to be noise cancelling for SAFETY reasons. That being said, they can be turned up loud enough to drown out whatever it is you are trying to ignore. The sound is not like DJ headphones, but is good quality for their purpose. I have absolutely no complaints and plan to buy some as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Txshan

customer_reviews.title: Headphones stay in and feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Plantronics BackBeat Fit Bluetooth Headphones. He bought them to use when working out, especially when running as the cord for his mp3 player would get in his way. These headphones fit in his ears and stay in when running and working out. He likes them so much he has even started using them all the time like when he mows the lawn, doing dishes or even doing work at this computer.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones I have no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones I have no complaints. I used another paid that was not over the ear and it kept falling out. I took these out today for a whole mile and other than my sunglasses making it feel weird since it's also over the ear they worked great and stayed in. People complain about the quality but It works just fine for me sounds good too. May not be as loud as my other ones that create a seal but it's really not that bad. I even jumped roped with them on. Again didn't even notice them.
customer_reviews.author: Drop

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a year before it stopped working.... Don't remember how long the warantee was, so I blew it off...
customer_reviews.author: NORMAN NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Lose the hoop or provide options
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bbfit heat set, I'm no expert on sound quality, but this unit works well. One issue I have is the hoop on the piece one inserts in the ear. I'm looking to replace the end piece to match my other BB Fit. My old bb Fit is so comfortable I would forget it was in my ears. Like a famous person once said, "you don't through away a Rolls Royce because of a dent". I still like this unit a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jlook

customer_reviews.title: good for yard work, not good for movies on the plane
customer_reviews.text: These connect easily to my iPhone and the controls are easy to work when they are on. After about 1.5 hours my ears start aching a bit. It is also difficult to get a good seal in my ear to drown out airplane noise. I can listen to music fine, but for movies, it is difficult to some of the conversations. For yard work and such, these do work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Tom

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this purchase! They are comfortable & the sound is incredible. They aren't bulky & the materials aren't rigid. They stay on through activity. The controls take some practice to get used to but that's ok. This is a quality made product that doesn't feel or sound cheap at all. I returned a similar item that was half the price and a quarter the quality. I was foolishly taken in by phony reviews of that product. This is well worth the higher price tag and there was no note in the box offering free products if a review was written. Platronics backbeat fit is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndyleewho

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect sounding, fitting and most comfortable active BT headphones. The sound is surprisingly great with clear highs, natural midrange and solid bass. These are quite durable and my last pear lasted two years before Iran them through the washer. I tried a few others but came back to this one as nothing comes close in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Plantronics are comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: The Plantronics are comfortable and light. They do not move around on your head while working out. They do not seal up your ear canal. This is good in that you can still hear ambient noises/ voices around you but slightly negative for the same reasons. They're the only wireless headphones that fit my wife's small ears so now I'm buying a second pair for her.
customer_reviews.author: cbcraw

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: If you need just for indoor use at the gym or you live in a rural area, these are a good pick. For those of us living in urban areas or in the suburbs and you plan on needing for outdoor exercise, avoid at all costs. While using in one of the latter environments, at best you will have constant distortion; and at worst your signal will be completely lost. There are just too many things (cars, automatic doors, red lights, etc) throwing out signals that interfere. If the battery dies and I can no longer use like other reviewers have stated, I highly doubt I will be ordering a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: WildBill

customer_reviews.title: Best runners that I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect running and general workout headphones. They stay in your ears where they're supposed to stay (surprisingly unusual for bluetooth headsets). They're light and unobtrusive (you may notice a tiny bit of 'flapping' on your neck) - most comfortable headphones I own (though I'll still use my Bose Quiet Comfort headphones on a plane). Moisture is not a problem. They are NOT noise cancelling or noise isolating - which is really good if you're an outdoor runner and need to be aware of your environment. You can enjoy your music (or 2 dope girls podcast) and not worry about landing on someone's hood. Highly recommended for a good, reliable, comfortable set of running headphones.
customer_reviews.author: James Hummell

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of exercise BT headphones if you don't need booming audio
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable/secure fit, good bluetooth connection, easy controls, safe design for outside hearing, sweat proof. Cons: Basic audio quality (no big bass or noise cancelling features here). I've tried other bone conduction headphones as well as some basic wired & wireless ear bud products...this is the best hybrid design I've used (I've had these for about four weeks) if you need something in the sweat/weather resistant category. It's the perfect mix of safety and audio (you can still hear outside noises), but if you crave full audio and/or noise cancelling, these are probably too weak. They are very light, secure, and comfortable/easy to wear for even long runs (2hrs+).
customer_reviews.author: S. Newell

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. I wished they got a little louder
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I wished they got a little louder, but overall the volume is fine. Because of this, you can't really cut the grass and listen to these, but they're great for a run and still being aware of your surroundings. I use mine mainly at work for this same reason, you can hear people approaching your desk and they don't talk to the back of your head for 3 minutes before they realize you can't hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Carls Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. I reordered and it also did not work. I called Plantronics and upon giving them the serial number, they informed me this item was so old the battery is dead. Don’t order from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: tamara Stauss

customer_reviews.title: They sound awesome, and they remain comfortably in my ears as ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound awesome, and they remain comfortably in my ears as I go for my runs. They pair easily with my Nexus 6P each time, and a pleasant voice indicates the battery level when you power them on. I don't notice any bouncing of the cable in the back, but I have only used these for jogging so far. I am still getting used to actually putting them on/in my ears, but I'm learning, and they definitely fit securely. No complaints at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - Terrible sound.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the cost of these headphones and reputation of the brand, I expected more. The sound was very thin, lacked a significant amount of low-range frequency (bass), and simply did not deliver an audio experience. I am not looking for a pair of audiophile-quality headphones, but the thin sound was a constant annoyance and reminder of how my $30 headphones sound 10x better. Returned and will continue looking for a good pair of wireless BT headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Slobes

customer_reviews.title: ... of searching before finding one I hoped would be good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: I did months of searching before finding one I hoped would be good enough for me. I am not disappointed. Long range on the Bluetooth and great sound. I run and do a lot of aerobics. They never fall out and are comfortable. Barely notice they are even there. Makes great calls too! Long battery life. If I had to list a con it's the strap is not adjustable. Can get caught in my book bag when hiking but then I learned to hang it over a low ponytail or bun. Now I'm good to go. LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth headset for everyday use. I have owned this for 10 months and the battery still last a long time. I can wear it for hours without taking it off. I also use it for phone calls and it worked pretty well. Don't expect noise reduction though, as the design is for sports/activities and it doesn't seal the ear canal entirely.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones I have ever used! I workout a ton. I have worn these running half marathon plus distances, and other high intensity interval type workouts. These headphones are super comfortable, and never bounce. They can handle all the sweat you put at them. I never lose a connection, and the sound quality is great! I have tried others, and these are superior in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Just not making the cut
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these but comes short at this price point with all the cheaper competitors out there Pros Good sound Good control buttons Support was good and replaced them but never really solve the issues Cons Expensive the plastic on the neck band peeled on both pairs the sound cut out often when moving around while my phone was in my pocket did not work consistently - some time didn't work when needed and then had to re-pair and reboot the phone - very inconvenient especially when you are needing them to just work
customer_reviews.author: hi1ton

customer_reviews.title: Luv my headphones
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the mobility of not having to deal with wires\cables. The headset fits comfortably in the ear but I have to admit, getting them on takes some doing. The ability to answer my phone with headset is a definite perk. Just have to get use to ' turning off ' the headset. Battery life is acceptable.I can usually get a weeks worth out of it, around 12 hours of use. Very happy with the sound generated, provides a good audio range
customer_reviews.author: rockinct

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in August of 2015. Since that time I've used them maybe a dozen times and in moving had misplaced them in a box. I just came across them and tried to charge them. NOTHING! Dead as a door nail and they will not take a charge. They are virtually brand new and still in the box that they came in. What junk. I would never purchase a Plantronics device again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Farner

customer_reviews.title: Just like many other reviews on here
customer_reviews.text: Just like many other reviews on here, these headphones worked for about 1 year, then quit charging. It is out of the one year warranty so now I have an $85 paperweight. I would NOT recommend these headphones if you expect to use them for longer than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Stop encouraging mediocrity
customer_reviews.text: Before buying those headphones I went through the reviews and saw one disturbing and recurring complaint : THE HEADPHONES KEEP DISCONNECTING FOR NO APPARENT REASON. I can't understand how Plantronics can release such buggy headphones for $80. Please don't bring the troubleshooting argument. I have had $20 Bluetooth headphones that never lose connection. It is just unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Sacko

customer_reviews.title: These sound good and I liked the way that they fit
customer_reviews.text: These sound good and I liked the way that they fit. The charge held for a long time. I purchased these November 30th, 2015 and only used them about 5 times total. However after only 1 charge, they will no longer charge. There is an indicator light that lights on the earpiece when plugged in, it lights up like it is going to charge, but when you unplug them, nothing. I just ordered a new pair by Sharkk, hopefully they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long! Already broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: Removing my good review. I've had these headphones since April 2016, light use (not even daily, sometimes not even weekly) and they have already broken! The button at the ear peice has broken right off. Tried to see if I coud file a claim and only a ONE YEAR warranty! On almost $100 dollar headphones! Rediculouse that they cannot be repaired or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kandicek83

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great and easy to use. Was wonderful not having a wire to deal with. However after about a year and a half of ownership, but about maybe 2 weeks of actual use they stopped taking a charge and won't turn on anymore. Since the product is more than a year plantronics wants 95 dollars to replace the product. Looking throughout the internet i find many instances of people with the same problem, even recently. Would not recommend buying this as it is highly unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Rezac

customer_reviews.title: Great company but they need to do a better job at quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive little toy; unfortunately I could never get it to charge up. The instructions stated the device had enough battery life right out of the box to pair up with Bluetooth. Nope. The red lights always stayed on even after 6 hours of charging. I never could get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: MUTT WONDERDUCK

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat Fit Bluetooth Headphones - Blue
product_meta.description:
Whatever your workout, the flexible, sweat-proof, Plantronics BackBeat FIT wireless stereo headphones keep pace with you. Its powerful audio lets you clearly hear your music, while its safety-oriented design lets you hear your surroundings and be seen at night. The reversible armband secures your smartphone while you're moving and stores your headphones when you're done - making it your perfect workout partner.

REVIEW


The BackBeat FIT in blue (view larger). IT'S TIME TO GET MOVING AND GET FIT
Wherever you reach for your personal best, the flexible, sweat-proof Plantronics BackBeat FIT wireless stereo headphones keep pace with you. BackBeat FIT delivers powerful audio but lets you hear your surroundings when you take it outside and has bright, reflective colors to add a measure of safety when you're out for that nighttime jog or walk. 

Safety-oriented eartip design lets you hear your surroundings (view larger). MADE FOR YOUR WORKOUT
Comfortable, stable, and built for action, BackBeat FIT features an active design that fits comfortably and stays put for all levels of exercise. The easily accessible on-ear controls let you keep moving while you control your music or calls, while the included neoprene armband comfortably secures your smartphone. When you've finished your workout, the BackBeat FIT folds up and can be stored in the armband.

Flexible headphones fold up for easy storage (view larger).
SWEAT-PROOF, DURABLE DESIGN
You can rely on the BackBeat FIT to work as hard as you do through rain, sweat, and even the splash of a sports drink. BackBeat FIT headphones are protected against sweat and moisture damage by its design and technology. Then, an invisible, protective nano-coating is applied during the manufacturing process, resulting in invisible liquid repellent properties that also make the earbuds more reliable, wherever your busy life takes you.

STAY MOVING LONGER
You'll enjoy a week of workouts with up to 8 hours of listening time. When the BackBeat FIT is out of range from your phone or tablet, the DeepSleep power-saving hibernation mode kicks in to keep the headphones charged for up to six months.

TRACK BATTERY LEVELS
Keep track of the battery life of your BackBeat FIT earbuds with a handy headset battery meter that automatically displays onscreen for iPhone and iPad. For Android smartphones and tablets, the free Plantronics Battery Meter app displays a headset battery meter and can provide on-screen alerts when your battery is low or fully charged.

GETS BETTER WITH TIME
Wirelessly update your BackBeat FIT using a free smartphone app no connection to a PC or Mac is needed. You will be automatically notified when new firmware is released, and both iOS and Android platforms are supported.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Plantronics BackBeat FIT headphones, smartphone armband, micro USB charging cable, quick start guide

BACKBEAT FIT BLUETOOTH FITNESS HEADPHONES
AT A GLANCE
 * Flexible design fits comfortably and stays put for all levels of exercise
 * Sweat-proof design and P2i coating
 * On-ear controls for calls and music
 * Included neoprene armband secures your smartphone 
 * Powerful speakers deliver the heart-pumping bass and crisp highs of your music 
 * Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 8 hours of listening time, up to 14 days of standby time
 * DeepSleep mode puts earbuds into hibernation when away from phone to extend battery life
 * Free app keeps headphones updated with latest firmware


Includes smartphone armband (smartphone not included; view larger).
feature_bullets: SPORTS AND WORKOUT EARBUDS: Specifically constructed with a flexible design so earbuds remain stable in your ear throughout all levels of exercise.
WATERPROOF AND SWEATPROOF: Designed with invisible nano-coating technology to protect earbuds against water and sweat during running and workouts.
LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE: Impressive 8 hours of wireless listening time per charge allows you to spend more time working out with these sport headphones.
WORKOUT FUNCTIONALITY: Easily accessible on-ear controls let you control music and calls through our Bluetooth technology while running, biking, and other forms of exercise.
SPORTS EARBUDS SAFETY: Headphones features a safety-oriented eartip design that allows you to hear your surroundings during outdoor exercise and activities.
